content.description: The following frequency table shows the responses from a group of college students who were asked to choose their favorite flavor of ice cream.
content.question: Flavor Frequency Vanilla 100 Chocolate 65 Strawberry 35 Mint chip 45 Coffee 30 Butter pecan 25 Which of the following statements is not supported by the table?

choices.label: The number of student responses is 300.
One-third of the students chose vanilla.
One-third of the students chose chocolate or strawberry.
One-fourth of the students chose mint chip or coffee.
One-half of the students chose vanilla or chocolate.

content.answer: One-half of the students chose vanilla or chocolate.

topic.text: 1.3: Representing a Categorical Variable with Tables

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
